content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":131511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はい、なんでしょう？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes, what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":131512,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お水ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Water?\""},{"lineNumber":131513,"originalJapaneseLine":"名前を呼ばれ、シーラが嬉しそうにランスに近づく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Called by name, Sheela happily approaches Lance."},{"lineNumber":131514,"originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着け、ただ世間話しようとしただけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Calm down, I just wanted to have some small talk.\""},{"lineNumber":131515,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その後、ヘルマンの様子はどうだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, how is the situation in Herman afterwards?\""},{"lineNumber":131516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ、ランス様のおかげで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes! Thanks to Lord Lance,"},{"lineNumber":131517,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今ではヘルマン内部も政策が円滑に進み、","translatedEnglishLine":"now policies within Herman are proceeding smoothly,"},{"lineNumber":131518,"originalJapaneseLine":"　飢えに苦しむ方が少しずつですが減りました」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the number of people suffering from hunger has gradually decreased.\""},{"lineNumber":131519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、そうだ、俺様のおかげだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, that's right, it's thanks to me.\""},{"lineNumber":131520,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝しろ、シーラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be grateful, Sheela.\""},{"lineNumber":131521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":131522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":131523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にこにこ、にこにこ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Smile, smile.\""},{"lineNumber":131524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何をヘラヘラ笑ってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you grinning about?\""},{"lineNumber":131525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch!\""},{"lineNumber":131526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":131527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　なんで叩かれて喜んどんだ、お前。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Why are you happy about being hit?\""},{"lineNumber":131528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えい、ぽかっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take this!\" (sound of a hit)"},{"lineNumber":131529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あうっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Auu!\""},{"lineNumber":131530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe...\""},{"lineNumber":131531,"originalJapaneseLine":"殴られた頭を撫でながらシーラは嬉しそうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela looked happy while patting her hit head."},{"lineNumber":131532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「変な奴隷」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Weird slave.\""},{"lineNumber":131533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？　あの、奴隷って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Um, slave...\""},{"lineNumber":131534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、シィルには言ってなかったか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, haven't I told Shieel?\""},{"lineNumber":131535,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シーラは俺の奴隷2号だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela is my slave number two.\""},{"lineNumber":131536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？　奴隷！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!? A slave!?\""},{"lineNumber":131537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなに驚くことか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it really that surprising?\""},{"lineNumber":131538,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前がいない間に不便だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"While you were absent, it was inconvenient,"},{"lineNumber":131539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こいつを俺様の奴隷に任命したのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I appointed this one as my slave.\""},{"lineNumber":131540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっと、だって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, but...\""},{"lineNumber":131541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヘルマンの大統領……なんですよね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're the president of Herman... right?\""},{"lineNumber":131542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":131543,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だからなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So what?\""},{"lineNumber":131544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……シィルさんというのは、もしかして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... Is it possible that Shieel-san is...\""},{"lineNumber":131545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、初めまして。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, nice to meet you."},{"lineNumber":131546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はランス様の助手のシィル――」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am Lord Lance's assistant, Shieel--\""},{"lineNumber":131547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch!\""},{"lineNumber":131548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こいつはシィル、奴隷1号。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is Shieel, slave number one."},{"lineNumber":131549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シーラの奴隷の先輩だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"He is senior to Sheela among the slaves.\""},{"lineNumber":131550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、1号さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-senior number one...\""},{"lineNumber":131551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「2号さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Number two...\""},{"lineNumber":131552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぉ……申し訳ありません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... I apologize..."},{"lineNumber":131553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様が、失礼なことを","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Lance has said something rude,"},{"lineNumber":131554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言い出してしまったみたいで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it seems...\""},{"lineNumber":131555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら、変なこと言うな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, don’t say strange things!\""},{"lineNumber":131556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、私がランス様に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I was the one who asked Lord Lance"},{"lineNumber":131557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴隷にして下さいとお願いしたんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"to make me a slave.\""},{"lineNumber":131558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、そうなんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":131559,"originalJapaneseLine":"（す、少し……変わった方？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Is he... a bit strange?)"},{"lineNumber":131560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahahaha!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名前を呼ばれ、シーラが嬉しそうにランスに近づく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Called by name, Sheela happily approaches Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着け、ただ世間話しようとしただけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calm down, I just wanted to have some small talk."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、ヘルマンの様子はどうだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, how is the situation in Herman afterwards?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいっ、ランス様のおかげで、
今ではヘルマン内部も政策が円滑に進み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now policies within Herman are proceeding smoothly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飢えに苦しむ方が少しずつですが減りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the number of people suffering from hunger has gradually decreased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、そうだ、俺様のおかげだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that's right, it's thanks to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　なんで叩かれて喜んどんだ、お前。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Why are you happy about being hit?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴られた頭を撫でながらシーラは嬉しそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela looked happy while patting her hit head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、シィルには言ってなかったか？
シーラは俺の奴隷2号だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela is my slave number two."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がいない間に不便だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "While you were absent, it was inconvenient,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつを俺様の奴隷に任命したのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I appointed this one as my slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの大統領……なんですよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the president of Herman... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……シィルさんというのは、もしかして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... Is it possible that Shieel-san is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はランス様の助手のシィル――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Lord Lance's assistant, Shieel--"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラの奴隷の先輩だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is senior to Sheela among the slaves."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が、失礼なことを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance has said something rude,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言い出してしまったみたいで……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I was the one who asked Lord Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷にして下さいとお願いしたんです」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名前を呼ばれ、シーラが嬉しそうにランスに近づく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Called by name, Sheela happily approaches Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着け、ただ世間話しようとしただけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calm down, I just wanted to have some small talk."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、ヘルマンの様子はどうだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, how is the situation in Herman afterwards?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいっ、ランス様のおかげで、
今ではヘルマン内部も政策が円滑に進み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now policies within Herman are proceeding smoothly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飢えに苦しむ方が少しずつですが減りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the number of people suffering from hunger has gradually decreased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、そうだ、俺様のおかげだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that's right, it's thanks to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　なんで叩かれて喜んどんだ、お前。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Why are you happy about being hit?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴られた頭を撫でながらシーラは嬉しそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela looked happy while patting her hit head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、シィルには言ってなかったか？
シーラは俺の奴隷2号だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela is my slave number two."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がいない間に不便だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "While you were absent, it was inconvenient,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつを俺様の奴隷に任命したのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I appointed this one as my slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの大統領……なんですよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the president of Herman... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……シィルさんというのは、もしかして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... Is it possible that Shieel-san is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はランス様の助手のシィル――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Lord Lance's assistant, Shieel--"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラの奴隷の先輩だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is senior to Sheela among the slaves."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が、失礼なことを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance has said something rude,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言い出してしまったみたいで……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I was the one who asked Lord Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷にして下さいとお願いしたんです」
